string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "The one bad bitches call super duper lame, now super duper fame, gets me super duper brain."
"The ones that make it complicated never get congratulated."
"Maybe if I was a jerk to girls, instead of being nice and speakin kind words, then maybe it would be ok to say then....I wasn't the good guy to begin with."
"Ive got some issues that nobody can see and all of these emotions are pouring out of me."
"I got 99 problems and they all bitches."
"The moon will illuminate my room and soon I'm consumed by my doom."
"The devil in the hot pink dress tryna ask me for one dance, he think he slick but my guardians protect me from his wrath."
"Sir you look high...I know but I prefer my eyes low"
"I am the lone wolf go where I wanna"
"I am happy, thats just the saddest lie"
"Please save a kid that needs some help, I can't see ahead of me so I move in stealth."
"What a world that im livin in, when do rain storms ever end?"
"I hit her up, I say what up? She says the sky. I say whats good? She say McDonalds apple pie."
"The one bad bitches, call super duper lame, now super duper fame , gets me super duper brain."
"Why cant everyone get a bong?"
"Ive got some issues that nobody can see. And all of these emotions are pouring out of me."
"It don't really matter just where you from, All that really matter is where you're goin'."
"And I try to piece the puzzle of the universe, Split an eight of shrooms just so I could see the universe!"
"The moon will illuminate my room and soon i'm consumed by my doom."
"And the devil in the hot pink dress tryna ask me for one dance, he think he slick but my guardians protect me from his wrath."
"This is just the first step, God walks with me, but I'm still vexed"
"Imma do just what I want.. looking ahead, no turning back."
"I have my life and I will live it Shut your mouth before I fuck it Ha, my jokes they will love it"
"I know it's easy to imagine, But it's easier to just do, See, if you can't do what you imagine, then what is imagination to you?"
"Your fate shall be whatever it shall be (be, be, be,be) We'll fight no more, I let these just things be (be, be, be,be)"
"Gettin' brain in the library cause I love knowledge. When you use your Medulla Oblongata And give me scoliosis until I comatoses And do it while I sleep yeah a little osmosis"
"And if I die before I wake, I pray the lord my soul to take But please don't cry, just know that I have made these songs for you"
"Ignorance to cope, man ignorance is bliss, ignorance is love and i need that shit"
"I am happy, thats just the saddest lie."
"I was late damn near every day, But Imma be on time when the stars align When my soul was happy."
"Maybe if I was a jerk to girls, instead of bein nice and speakin kind words, then maybe it would be ok to say then....I wasnt the good guy to begin with"
"I keep my girls short, sweet, thick and petite."
"Why must it feel so wrong, when I try and do right, do right?"
"Soaring through paradise when I'm closing my eyes."
"I guess if I was simple in the mind, everything would be fine"
"Weird itself, even in the dictionary, is just something that is different and unexplainable. A weirdo is someone who follows their heart. Im definitely weird, aint nothing wrong with that."
"Girls that I dated, it's ok I am not mad yo Unless you stabbed me in the heart, no love ho."
"Gotta terminate the hate spread the positive, without it bein whack and cheesy to the little kids."
"Dim them lights get it in pimp tight do wat i do i lace up my own nikes."
"Who gives a shit what people talkin bout fam, Haters shake my hand but i keep the sanitizer on deck!"
"I'ma say some shit that make you think I lost my mind I'm the only nigga that could watch the sun and don't go blind."
"Feelin' like im peter pan, minus the tights and the fairies."
"I get in their head.. they dont even see my bread.. Oh sooo, Oh so fly.. cool as i wana be, one hell of a guy."
"In my mind... its sounds like oooooouuuuu!! when im goone.. it feels like oooooouuu!! when im zoned. . . im feelin alright!!!!! i forget about it alll...."
"I'm a cancerous lump in the throat of the game, any hatin nigga's kemo flow can never intervene."
"I'm walkin with the heart of a lion. . . yeahh!!"

"Feel so cursed cuz i cant stop a curse from spitting, without feeling like im phony, cuz i speak my thoughts everytime i think them up.. i gaurantee you i will win.. if i was ever wrong, this moment aint it."
"Cuz IM super-cut-lery-alistic-leaner-allidoscious.. in rap ferocious, i be coachin the league...blood sweat and tears homie im made of it"
"Wised up, now i want a dame.. nice butt, rollin in the range.. love me, even when im broke.. stay wit me, n never let me go"
"Soaring through.. paradise.. when im closing my eyes.. Im.. MR. SOLO DOLO."
"Your cool, your cool, Fuck you!... and to the bitch that. Oh yea fuck you too!!"
"Play it back from the top if you recognize real."
"Take a bit, Little bit, Roll it up, Take a hit, feeling lit, feeling right, 2AM Summer night."
"And if i die before i awake i pray to the lord my soul to take but please dont just know that i have made these songs for you."
"But Man Ol' Girl Gotta Phat Ol' Ass....Yea The Type To Make You Tell A Bitch Just Dance."
"Step up in the place, just me nd my budddy.. everywhere i go they screamin out KID CUDI!!!!!"
"The girl he wants dont seem to want him too, it seems the feelings that she had are through.. through."
"Do you wana be him? think twice, you'll commit suicide tryna read my mind."
"People tell me slow my roll.. im screamin out.. FUCK THAT!!"
"I be posted with my blunt and a brew my dude"
"Im so gone man im never alert, but it feels so good... no more hurt."
"In my place no hate shall enter, ivin high up there up there, loatin floatin hopin i can find peace somewhere."
"Of course im gonna sound suicidal when damn near everything else sounds like cheese balls."
"Girls stay a mile away, do the single lady dance by them otha motha fcukas, not me."
"I could find peace somewhere."
"I'm somethin different in all aspects, Don't want a woman just to love her assets, I Still wife her up even with her flat chest, The type to get hurt, But that's the past tense."

"People told me slow my roll I'm screaming out fuck that, Imma do just what I want lookin ahead no turnin back, if I fall if I die know I lived it to the fullest, if I fall if I die know I lived and missed some bullets."
"For even in hell i still have faith ,to one day be free with my father at the gates."
"People tell me slow my role am yelling out fuck that, am do just what i want."
"I got 99 problems, nd they all b*tches, feelin' like jigga man, care free livin'."
"Struggle is the enemy, but weed is the remedy."
"They can't comprehend, or even come close to understandin him. I guess if I was borin they would love me more, guess if I was simple in the mind everything would be fine."
"I'm cooler than a polar bears toes, cleveland is the reason."
"What can be better than this right now? You know what Im saying? Cafe, con leche in hand, money in my pocket. Life is good my friend-kid cudi as domingo dean."
"Puff puff pass wit cha b*tch ass, Back in High School smoke week when I cut class, And now I'm an addict."
"I was high when I finally had the chance to see, Everything thats pretty aint always good for me."
"In my zone, I'm feelin' alright, I'm Feelin' Alright, I forget about it all."
"Time to terminate the hate spread the positive!"
"Dope, Mr. Solo Dolo."

"Maybe a little weed to intensify the scene, To provide a solid answer to the question why I lean? A boneafide fiend that be taking by the beams of light, Man on the moon aint a name, its a way of life."
"Ignorance to cope man, Ignorance is bliss, Ignorance is love, and I need that shit."
"Imma be gone way past November, even stay up there, up there, floatin', Floatin', hopin' I will find peace somewhere."
"Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today."
"Living life is a choice, making a differences in someone else's isn't."
"The first step I ever took alone made me realize the prince was made for the throne."
"I'm psychic in the end, I fake my thoughts and reality lets them in."
"A whole new Cudder for the new class."
"Smoking so much weed I am better off alone, I'm in my own zone."
"I guarantee you I will win if I was ever wrong this moment ain't it."
"I can't disappear the stress my life's way beyond yo mama knows best."
"I never gave a FUCK. I never gave a FUCK about what people thought about me. I mean I did, but FUCK it you know what I'm sayin'?"
"Greetin' my niggas wit' dap and pounds, So if I fall I won't hit the ground, These are the things that'll make me smile, Knowin' this blunt might burn a while."
"Only things that calm me down is pussy and some cali trees!"
"I be low, when i see that im a different dude."
"Remember your not strange, but your not the same man."
"Girls that I dated, it's ok I am not mad yo Unless you stabbed me in the heart, no love ho."
"My mind runs I can never catch it even if I got a head start."
"(Sir you look high) i know, but i prefer my eyes low."
"The moon will illuminate my room and soon i'm consumed by my doom."
"Red Rum them tryin to figure out him, baptize myself in a river hennessy."
"I never was the shoulda coulda woulda type, I am in control of what the people say they like."
"Life is short and filled lots of grief and doubt so I just pull that bag of colorful frosty leaves on out and free my scalp."
"Can't believe how I had the dream of Martin King, but they ain't takin me out on no balcony."
"After LeBron, I'm what's next."
"If I die today the last thing you remember won't, Be about some apple bottom jeans with the boots with the fur, Baby how I dream of being free since my birth."
"Remember you're not strange, but you are not the same."
"I'll never get why the earth is a puzzle that i'll never fit."
"Once upon a time nobody gave a fuck."
"Embrace the Martian, embrace the Martian."
"Knock knock Cudi open up it's Chip, gotta kush pack shells and some Henny would could sip."
"So if I slip away, if I die today, the last thing you remember won't be about some apple-bottom jeans with the boats with the fur..."
"These are the things that make me smile, knowing this blunt might burn for a while..."
"Haters shake my hands but I keep that sanitizer on deck."
"If I fall, if I die, know I lived it to the fullest If I fall, if I die, know I lived and missed some bullets."
"I keep my self so lifted I am a custom to new height."
"People told me slow my road, im screaming out fuck that, ima do just what i want lookin ahead no turnin back."
"Tell 'em motherfuckers that somebody once told me if you get high still strive to be somebody."
"Feelin like im peter pan, minus the tights and the fairies."
"I've got some issues that nobody can see, and all these emotions are pouring out of me."
"You don't really care about the trials of tomorrow, rather lay awake in a bed full of sorrow."
"'ma say some shit that make you think I lost my mind, I'm the only nigga that could watch the sun and don't go blind."
"I never let a motherfucka break me dogg who gives a fuck if a nigga don't like your steez tell em to buzz off your n-u-tz."
"It don't matter your race just take a blunt to the face."
"All i do is make it simple, the ones who make it complicated never get congratulated."
"It's like I playin all my stuff for everybody, all the people givin me feedback, and they be like Why you shit sound so different like its a bad thing, and I say, Why not.....nigga haha."
"Guess If I was simple in the mind everythin would be fine."
"Salutations to all, You can call me Cudi. Or Mr. Extravagant, cause I'm keepin' my money."
"Dim them lights get it in pimp tight do wat I do I lace up my own nikes."
"Shut your mouth before I fuck it."
"Please save me lord, my life is such a chore. But I, I need this to be ok, be ok. what, what they think of me it aint no thing. my heart, heart is broke completely."
"They can't comprehend or even come close to understanding him. I guess if i was boring they would love me more. Guess if i was simple in the mind everything would be fine."
"So a red bull and a blunt would be fine, just wanna feel fine, just wanna kill time, just wanna relax and think of a rhyme."
"The pain is deep. A silent sleeper you won't hear a peep, peep. The girl he wants don't seem to want him too. It seems the feelings that she had are through, through."
"I like when you talk because your voice is angel-ess, I want to kiss you on your space below the navel at the place that you keep me so moist like a towelet."
"People told me slow my roll, I'm screaming out fuck that! imma do just what I want, lookin' ahead no turnin' back."
"It don't matter your race just take a blunt to the face."
"Sing along lil' mama you ain't gotta worry bout no drama no. I'll provide for friends and fam and fans cleveland city grinding man stay at flow the kids hope."
"I've got some issues that nobody can see, and all these emotions are pouring out of me."
"You don't really care about the trials of tomorrow rather lay awake in a bed full of sorrow."
"You can look all over but you'll never find.. Hot shit like mine."
"I keep myself so lifted , i am accustomed to new heights."
"Way very far away. To another universe where all people say,Its a new new place for the special to embrace, like a martian who is seemingly wondered out of place."
"Split an eighth of shrooms just so I could see the universe. I tried to think about myself as a sacrifice.Just to show the kids they ain't the only ones who up at night."
"The moon will illuminate my room and soon I'm consumed by doom. Once upon a time nobody gave a fuck but when it's all said 'n' done my cocks been sucked."
"But see i'll never get, why da earth is a puzzle that i'll never fit im outta their world."
"What a world that Im livin in, will the rain storms ever end?"
"Haters suck my balls, two time, I never say goodbye because Im on mine, All my life, wanna do something major, Now every little thing I do might make it in the paper."
"People told me slow my road, im screaming out fuck thaat, ima do just what i want lookin ahead no turnin back."
"Until you meet a kid like K I niggas thought i was crazy my momma knw i stay high we gettin money mom."
"Please keep the bapes on my feet, so i can watch the devil ice grill me."
"All the crazy shit I did tonight, Those'll be the best memories, I just wanna let it go for the night, That will be the best therapy for me."
"And the weed is guranteed to be just what i need."
"And now my face book poppin, cuz I told all the girls I would be the hot shit. One day, this will be my world."
"You don't understand I don' need you honey, I beat my dick like it owe me money."
"I'm cooler than a polar bears toes."
"Dont give a shit what people talk about fam haters shake my hand but i keep the sanitizer on deck."
"Why must it feel so wrong when I try and do right."
"They say easy friend, there he go talking about weed again, probably cuz of all that weed in him."
"New new place for the special to embrace, like a martian who seemingly wonder outta place, take what you need from the valley the hope."
"But i was high, when i finally had the chance to see, everything thats pretty aint' always good for me."
"I want to kiss you on your space below your navelette, that space that you keep neat, so moist like a towelette."
"Wanna know really, really, really who I'm dating, Is she civilian or super duper famous? Is she African American, Caucasian, or Asian? Or maybe Spanish, it doesn't matter my nigga, I love them all."
"I've been feelin some type of way about her, wanna wife her, borderline I don' really like her, cuz she like to play around nd she kno she got it."
"Have just one more cap babe (babe), have just one more stem babe!"
"Why Big Bro Take All The Hot Bitches..?! Dear God Me Too I Like The Hot Bitches..!"
"I aint gotta wait for no one. If I want to fly, Ill fly for freedom, hey!"
"So I cuss like a sailor and I smoke weed. I'm exactly what an older rapper's kid will be!"
"Don't critique me b'. What i do doesnt reflect you."
"My mind runs i can never catch even if i got a head start."
"Have you ever heard of some shit so real? Beyond from the heart, from the soul you can feel."
"I guess if I was borin they would love me more. Guess if I was simple in the mind, Everything would be fine."
"People told meto slow my roll, I'm screamn out FUCK THAT. I'm a do just what I want looking forward no turning back!"
"I smoke to get high becuz the world is so low."
"I know its easy to imagine, but it's easier to just do. See if you cant do what you imagine, then what's imagination to you?"
"Starrin' like a creeper cuz' you gotta keeper."
"Imma show you how I be livin', from a long time ago, a young nigga, he was timid, now I'm in the zone, seein' things so vivid, Hide my soul?, nah homie, not even, Imma zone out till I lose feeling."
"Super Duper K-I-D, I'm on another planet b."
"Why yo shit so different?"
"I'll be up up and away. up up and away, cause in the end they'll judge me anyways, so whatever."
"Just a waste of space in your brain, to take the place of hate for things all the same."
"Focus baby don't look at me, see right through me, understand my heartbeat murmurs to mock your rhythm,Yeah, my nuts, the other girls want em, But they can't have."
"I cant feel the left side of my face stressful thoughts have been replaced with henny and coke and Jaeger."
"Ignorance the coke man, ignorance is bliss, ignorance is love and I need that shit."
"I am not a role model but i am the blueprint."
"I'm on the pursuit of happiness and I know everything that shines ain't always gonna be gold. I'll be fine once I get it, I'll be good."
"In the end they'll judge me anyway, so whatever."
"Dont call me a rapper, I'm an artist. Update your minds. I 'INCORPORATE' hip hop elements because I am part MC, but I am all things musical. All things melodically beautiful."
"They tell me all good things must end well those muthafucka's ain't have this friend"
"Gentle with the drugs, heavy with the love"

"I dont smoke weed anymore. Ill leave it to the kids. Im 27 with a business to run and I need to be alert and focused with my mind strong. For those who still get it on, smoke one in my memory as your favorite lonely stoner."
"They trying to make me look like the poster boy for violence and ignorance, I tell motherfuckers I'm the poster boy for honesty, realness, anarchy, I don't give a fuck about this business."
"The only three things a guy should want change to about his girl is her last name, address, and her viewpoint on men."
"Every hit and every kick is rapid fire and my thoughts is sour if I feel there is no lighter."
"Im aiming to break some bones. Im focused and overdosed on adrenaline and I strengthen them with confidence."
"Pow Pow Pow I knock em down. I am flawless in every round."
"Battle be strong the new kid. Dont matter my scars were leaking Ill be standing still demanding, Ill be winner. Rapid punches delivered."
"I look into you toothless I tell you know whats your past. To try it, it would be stupid, your choice of technique is foolish."
"No, no, no, I wont get bodied. My heart is powered with power from cowards."
"I wont runaway. Cowards runaway."
"Dont cry for me. It is my destiny to be where I am. I said listen to tick go tock on the bomb Waiting."
"Seen things. Things that I wish I had not. No worries It is my destiny to be where I am. I said listen to tick go tock on the clock."
"Perfect is the word. Its the main thing that the lost souls want."
"Ballin so low most fools couldnt price me silently stunt, with a blunt full of p.e"
"Wish I could tell my brother something for some motivation and get him out that gutter."
"I can never let this be the end of days the end of dreams so sure Ill be ok my mind is stronger than yours, wait quicker no lie."
"No lie some days are better days walking with my mind my heart will know the way."
"Ive come to find out coming up my senses say to hide out so many alone insecurities see that checking in the mirror. Im a maniac I admit it, do you get it?"
"I cant lie sometimes Im feeling low please get outta my mind. Imma find out which way to go I need to take control."
"Maybe Im not exactly what you want me to be, maybe you need not worry bout me, baby."
"Oooh, if youre looking for real love dont come around here."
"No more chances if you blow this, you bogus I will never ever let you live this down, down, down."
"Here, summon every single bit of courage. Im a Lion heart. They start it then I finish it."
